scripts.db:migrate: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path dist/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:undo: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --migrations-path dist/migrations
scripts.db:create: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.db:drop: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:drop
